version_description: ● 错误修复
● 修复“视频没有声音”
● 修复iOS11.02以上系统时，在此应用相册中无法查看照片的问题
● Crash bug fix

● Add two address formats
● Support search for custom text
● Bug fix
Bug fix

● Support satellite hybrid map
● Fix bug when taking image with volume button
• Fix bug for recording 720P 60fps video

• Support flash for front camera
• Support insert tag to photo
• Display battery power when recording
• Support recording 720P 120fps(slow motion) video format
• Bug fix

• UI and compatibility improvement
• Add two address formats

• Add timer control button on the main interface
• Supports layout that easy to toggle camera
• Support display tags on the camera
• Support display only speed or altitude, support imperial units
• Support three text margin modes: no margin, one line margin, suitable for printing
• Hide the particle button by default
• Add two address formats and bug fix
• Other bug fix

• Add timer control button on the main interface
• Supports layout that easy to toggle camera
• Support display tags on the camera
• Support display only speed or altitude, support imperial units
• Support three text margin modes: no margin, one line margin, suitable for printing
• Hide the particle button by default
• Add two address formats and bug fix
• Other bug fix

• Add time-lapse video mode
• Optical zoom is supported if the camera has this feature
• Support for recording 720P 15fps video
• Add 25 date/time formats to display the date and time in two lines
• Add 2 address formats
• Fix some bugs
Change to flat icon

• Support display compass
• Support "Half line" margins for text
• Improvements for "AF lock"
• UI improvements for iPhone5S
• Add more text colors
• Fix "can't share video by Airdrop"
• Fix bug of address and UTM
• Some other bug fixed

• Fix bug of multi-line text
• Support adding emoji to custom text

• Support adjust exposure
• Support change the size of compass, can show the text of direction
• Support show the value of the slider
• Add speed, altitude, direction, accuracy to Exif
• Add GPS formats with the accuracy value
• Support file name formats with index number or date
• Support set the interval of time-lapse video
• Add two time formats in uppercase
• Fix the name is always "shareImage" when sharing
• Bug fixes

• Support dark mode on iOS13
• Bug fixes

• Support video segmentation (15 seconds, 1 minute, 5 minutes, 1 hour, etc.)
• Support video stabilization
• Support keep original photo
• Support ultra wide camera
• Support reset file name index number
• Support torch mode for flash
• Bug fix for compass

1.92
• Fix "GPS can't be displayed when airplane mode is turned on"
• Add transistor font
• Add "one hour" interval to time-lapse mode
1.91
• Support video segmentation (15 seconds, 1 minute, 5 minutes, 1 hour, etc.)
• Support video stabilization
• Support keep original photo
• Support ultra wide camera
• Support reset file name index number
• Support torch mode for flash
• Bug fix for compass
• Fix “The feature of locking Camera orientation to horizontal doesn't work”

• Fix "Transparent backgrounds in logo images showing up white"
• Fix "The compass angle is opposite when using front camera"
• UI improvements
• Bug fixes
